title: Webber Naturals B12 Methylcobalamin 1000Mcg Sublingual Tabs 80S
description:
A sublingual cherry flavored tablet suitable for vegetarians providing methylcobalamin , the active form of B12. Vitamin B12 is vital for energy metabolism, red blood cells formation and immune health. Available in 1000 mcg and 5000 mcg.

Methylcobalamin, the active form of B12, is more easily absorbed and stays in the body longer, while other forms such as cyanocobalamin must be converted to methylcobalamin in a two-step process.
Helps maintain the body’s ability to metabolize nutrients and prevent vitamin B12 deficiency.
Helps in energy metabolism, red blood cell formation, and normal immune function.
A factor in normal growth and development, and in the maintenance of good health.

description:
A SOOTHING, NATURAL WAY TO HELP YOUR BABY SLEEP
Create a peaceful bedtime routine with Grounded Baby Sweet Dreams Spray, a gentle, aromatherapeutic mist designed to calm and relax your little one before sleep. Infused with pure essential oils known for their soothing properties, this natural spray sets the stage for restful nights without the use of synthetic fragrances or sleep aids. Lightly mist over cribs, bedding, pajamas, or the nursery to create a comforting atmosphere that promotes deep, undisturbed sleep.
WHY CHOOSE A NATURAL SLEEP SPRAY?
Creating a stress-free bedtime routine should start with a calming mist into the bath, or onto their bedding or pajamas. Whether you’re soothing a restless newborn or helping your toddler settle down, this mist provides a natural, gentle way to support healthier sleep patterns. Works for parents too!
SAFE FOR BABIES, BETTER FOR THE PLANET
Unlike conventional room sprays that release synthetic chemicals into the air, our biodegradable, eco-friendly formula ensures that your baby’s environment remains clean, pure, and toxin-free. Perfect for naptime, bedtime, or even moments of restlessness, this versatile mist is an essential part of a calm and peaceful nighttime routine. Because every baby deserves a restful, sweet dream.
How to use:
1. Mist into air, or onto bedding.
2. A great addition for bath time – spray some into the air or into the bath water to create a calming aromatherapy atmosphere”
Ingredients:
Water, Lavender, and Frankincense Essential Oils, Ethanol

title: Grounded Baby Sting-Free First Aid Spray – 100Ml
description: Grounded Baby Sting-Free First Aid Spray is a non-toxic and hypoallergenic solution for everyday skin care. Made with electrolyzed water (HOCl), a compound naturally produced by our bodies to fight pathogens, it doesn’t sting and is safe for cuts, scrapes, burns, diaper rash, and irritated skin. This gentle spray quickly soothes and disinfects without alcohol, fragrances, or harsh chemicals. Safe for babies, it promotes faster healing and prevents infection. No rinse needed, just spray and go. Keep it in your diaper bag or first aid kit for quick, convenient relief.

title: Lansinoh Plastic Milk Storage Bottles
description:
Lansinoh’s Breastmilk Storage Bags keep precious breastmilk safe and secure, protecting important vitamins and nutrients that help baby grow. Built super strong, Lansinoh bags come with a double zipper seal to prevent leakage. Presterilized for safe storage plus BPA and BPS free.
Pump directly into Lansinoh breastmilk storage bags, compatible with all major breast pump brands.
Once frozen, bags can be stored flat or standing up for increase storage flexibility.
Each bag can hold up to 6 ounces of precious breastmilk safely.
After one time use, bags can be recycled at locations that accept #4 plastic.

title: Johnsons Baby Oil 300Ml
description: Our Clinically Proven Mildness formula is specially designed for baby s delicate skin.Moisturises and protects delicate skin from dryness and is ideal for baby massage.Dermatologist-tested.Hypoallergenic.Free from dyes.Ultra gentle daily care.

title: Aveeno Stress Relief Moisturizing Lotion 354Ml
description: Aveeno skin relief moisturizing lotion is a fast absorbing body lotion that starts to work immediately to nourish and restore essential moisture, so your skin feels softer and healthier. Formulated with active naturals triple oat complex with oat oil and natural shea butter, this lotion for sensitive skin is clinically shown to relieve, soothe extra-dry skin while moisturizing it for a full 24 hours. As a skin protectant active ingredient, oatmeal can help restore skin’s normal ph and aid in the maintenance of skin’s moisture barrier to help prevent and protect dry skin. Aveeno skin relief moisturizing lotion is also fragrance-free, steroid-free and gentle enough for sensitive skin. From humble beginnings in 1945, the story of the aveeno brand has been one of discovery. By unlocking nature’s powers through scientific advances, they have discovered ways to nurture and transform skin and hair to an enhanced state of natural health and beauty. Aveeno uses select natural ingredients because of their advanced benefits. These are called active naturals, natural ingredients uniquely formulated to deliver visible results. Scientists at aveeno follow highest standards of ingredient selection, formulation and manufacturing, with processes that retain the strength and purity of such ingredients. Active Ingredients: Dimethicone 1.2%; Inactive Ingredients: Water, glycerin, distearyldimonium chloride, petrolatum, isopropyl palmitate, cetyl alcohol, avena sativa (oat) kernel flour, benzyl alcohol, avena sativa (oat) kernel oil, steareth-20, avena sativa (oat) kernel extract, butyrospermum parkii (shea) butter, sodium chloride

title: Sebamed Baby Lotion 100Ml
description: It is very important to keep a baby’s skin clean and moisturised. There are several baby care products that contain harsh chemicals and using these on his/her delicate skin can be harmful for such soft and sensitive skin. Babies should therefore be treated with utmost care and maintaining cleanliness is a must to maintain his/her health and growth.

title: Malibu Protective Lotion For Kids Spf30 200Ml
description: Protect delicate skin with this highly effective, high protection lotion which is easy to apply and gentle on skin.

title: Lansinoh Manual Breast Pump
description: Designed for ease of use, Lansinoh’s manual breast pump provides a discreet and convenient way of expressing while on the move, with no need for batteries or an electrical source.

title: Johnsons Baby Powder 200G
description: Johnson’s Baby Powder 200g is made with their proven mildness and helps to absorb extra moisture. Use after a nappy change or bath to leave you baby’s skin feeling dry and comfortable, and with a hint of fragrance.

title: Johnsons Baby Jelly Scented ( Fragranced)  250Ml
description:
Our Clinically Proven Mildness formula is specially designed for baby’s delicate skin
Enriched with nourishing oil
Lightly fragranced
Helps prevent against the causes of nappy rash by creating a barrier against wetness

title: Johnsons Baby Bath Top To Toe 550Ml
description: Our Johnson  s Top-to-Toe Wash is clinically proven to be as mild as water and is specially designed to gently cleanse baby  s delicate skin.It lathers quickly and rinses easily, leaving your baby  s skin clean and feeling healthy.

title: Cetoderm Ap Moisturizing Emollient Cream 450Ml
description: Cetoderm Dry Skin Emollient is an intensive moisturizer and emollient cream that is suitable for daily use on all skin types and dry skin conditions. It moisturizes the skin, protecting it from drying out and can be used as a soap substitute. This product is Endorsed by dermatologists and has been clinically proven to moisturize. It is color free, fragrance-free paraben-free and SLS Free. Its Ingredients include aqua (water), glycerin, paraffin and Liquidum

title: Cetaphil Restoraderm Eczema Body Wash 295Ml
description: Cetaphil restoraderm body wash 295ml is a creamy wash that gently cleanses and rinses without irritation. It holds skin-nourishing oils for normal and healthy skin growth and offers a gentle, soap-free cleansing. It is formulated to soothe dry, itchy skin associated with skin reactions such as eczema and atopic dermatitis. It helps clear pores without over-drying and this prevents the proliferation of disease-causing micro-organisms.

title: Bennetts Bath & Massage Drops 200Ml
description: Bennetts Bath and Massage Drops 200m. Bennetts Aqueous Bath Drops is a fragrance-free and hypo-allergenic emollient bath additive that keeps baby’s skin moisturized, soft and clean.

title: Johnsons Baby Moisturising Lotion 200Ml
description: When a baby is born, their skin is at its most delicate. That?s why we perfected our formulas over 125 years so they?re now even more gentle for all. Our Johnson?s baby lotion is made with coconut oil and leaves delicate skin feeling soft and smooth after just 1 use. Great for kids and adults too

title: Dexorange Caps 30S
description: Dexorange capsule is used to treat and prevent Iron deficiency anaemia. It prevents iron, zinc, folic acid and Vitamin B12 deficiencies during pregnancy, nursing.

title: First Steps Feeding Bottle 250Ml First Steps784
description:
At 1st Step, we pride ourselves on being the go-to destination for feeding bottles for your little one. Our commitment to providing safe and high-quality feeding bottles is unparalleled. We carefully curate our selection of bottles to ensure that you have access to the best and most innovative designs on the market
A viable alternative for breastfeeding
1st Step’s feeding bottles feature an easy grip design, providing a comfortable and secure hold while feeding your baby.
BPA- free

title: Alvityl Multivitamin Syrup 150Ml
description: A food supplement intended for children from 3 years old and allowing to reboost the organism in case of temporary fatigue, a growth spurt, or after an infectious episode.
